title: Ep. 45. The Eleventh Hour - Chapter Five
description: Now that Refuge's destroyer has been revealed, our heroes work together to discover a way to stop it. But how many more attempts will they get at solving this, their most deadly mystery yet? Merle leads the group in prayer. Magnus plays hardball. Taako gets on his diamond grind.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
